title: Limited time ward skin?
body:
I was just wondering, does anyone know when the next limited time ward skin (or any type of ward skin) will come out as i am looking for a cool one to buy. Hopefully its a poro featured ward skin.

Cheers
- Gu5t4v0 M3x1x4n0

replies.body: end of the season i guess. S5 ward. also victorious ward if thats the kind of thing you go for
